AUTH_BEARER_TOKEN_MISSING: Bearer token not found or invalid
AUTH_ONLY_OTR_CERTIFICATE_ALLOWED: Only OTR Certificate is allowed for this flow
AUTH_REGISTRATION_PARTIAL_SUCCESS: Registration successful, but document upload failed. Please upload the OTR Certificate after login.
PASSWORD_UPDATE_REQUIRED: Password update is required. Please change your temporary password.
USER_DOC_DATA_INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid doc_data format: Unable to stringify JSON
USER_WHOSE_PHONE_NUMBER_FIELD_NOT_FOUND: whosePhoneNumber custom field does not exist. Please create it first.
USER_VC_MAPPING_DATA_MISSING: VC mapping data is missing or invalid
USER_NO_VC_DATA_FROM_QR: No VC data found in Dhiway QR processing result
USER_STATUS_FETCH_FAILED: Error while getting status from response
KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_TOKEN_FAILED: Failed to get Keycloak admin token
KEYCLOAK_USER_TOKEN_FAILED: Failed to get Keycloak user token
FILE_UPLOAD_INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Invalid file type. Only PDF, JPG, JPEG, and PNG are allowed.
FILE_UPLOAD_FILE_TOO_LARGE: File size exceeds the maximum limit.
FILE_UPLOAD_PROFILE_PICTURE_TOO_LARGE: Profile picture size exceeds the maximum limit.
FILE_UPLOAD_FAILED: Failed to upload file to storage
FILE_BUFFER_EMPTY: File buffer is empty or invalid
FILE_TOO_SMALL_OR_CORRUPTED: Invalid file: file is too small or corrupted
FILE_INVALID_SIGNATURE: Invalid file signature for {{filename}}. Expected PDF, JPEG, or PNG but detected signature: {{signature}}
OCR_FILE_BUFFER_EMPTY: File buffer is empty or invalid
OCR_TIMEOUT: Request timeout while processing document. Please try with a smaller file.
OCR_NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
OCR_TEXT_EXTRACTION_FAILED: Unable to process document text extraction. Please try again.
OCR_NOT_CONFIGURED: OCR service not properly configured. Please contact support.
OCR_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT: Document format not supported for text extraction.
OCR_SERVICE_BUSY: OCR service is temporarily busy. Please try again in a few minutes.
OCR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: OCR service credentials are invalid. Please check AWS access key and secret.
OCR_CREDENTIALS_EXPIRED: OCR service credentials have expired. Please update AWS credentials.
OCR_INVALID_REGION: OCR service region configuration is invalid. Please check AWS region setting.
OCR_GEMINI_INVALID_KEY: Gemini API key is invalid. Please check configuration.
OCR_GEMINI_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT: Document format not supported by Gemini API.
OCR_GEMINI_ACCESS_DENIED: Gemini API access denied. Please check your API key permissions.
OCR_GEMINI_RATE_LIMIT: Gemini API rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes.
OCR_GEMINI_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Gemini API service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
OCR_GEMINI_PROCESSING_FAILED: Unable to process document text extraction with Gemini. Please try again.
OCR_GEMINI_NO_TEXT_CONTENT: No text content received from Gemini. Reason: {{reason}}
OCR_TESSERACT_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT: Document format not supported for text extraction.
OCR_TESSERACT_FILE_TOO_LARGE: Document is too large for processing. Please try with a smaller file.
OCR_TESSERACT_PROCESSING_FAILED: Unable to process document text extraction with Tesseract. Please try again.
OCR_BEDROCK_NOT_CONFIGURED: Bedrock service not properly configured. Please contact support.
OCR_BEDROCK_SERVICE_BUSY: Bedrock service is temporarily busy. Please try again in a few minutes.
OCR_BEDROCK_INVALID_REQUEST: Invalid request to Bedrock service. Please try again.
OCR_BEDROCK_MODEL_NOT_READY: AI model is not ready. Please try again in a few minutes.
OCR_BEDROCK_PROCESSING_FAILED: Unable to process document mapping with Bedrock. Please try again.
OCR_PROVIDER_NOT_CONFIGURED: {{provider}} service not properly configured. Please contact support.
OCR_PROVIDER_INVALID_KEY: {{provider}} API key is invalid. Please check your configuration.
OCR_PROVIDER_RATE_LIMIT: {{provider}} API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
OCR_PROVIDER_TIMEOUT: {{provider}} API connection timeout. Please check your internet connection.
OCR_PROVIDER_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: {{provider}} service credentials are invalid. Please check configuration.
OCR_PROVIDER_CREDENTIALS_EXPIRED: {{provider}} service credentials have expired. Please update credentials.
OCR_PROVIDER_INVALID_REGION: {{provider}} service region configuration is invalid. Please check region setting.
OCR_PROVIDER_INVALID_FORMAT: {{provider}} service received invalid document format. Please check the document and try again.
OCR_PROVIDER_CONFIG_ERROR: {{provider}} service configuration error. Please try again later.
OCR_MAPPING_TIMEOUT: Request timeout while processing document mapping. Please try again.
OCR_MAPPING_NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection failed during document mapping. Please try again.
OCR_MAPPING_PROCESSING_FAILED: Unable to process document mapping. Please try again.
OCR_UNSUPPORTED_PROVIDER: Unsupported OCR_PROVIDER: {{provider}}. Supported: aws-textract, google-gemini, tesseract
OCR_UNSUPPORTED_TEXT_EXTRACTION_PROVIDER: Unsupported text extraction provider: {{provider}}. Supported providers: aws-textract, google-gemini, tesseract

QR_DHIWAY_GET_REQUEST_FAILED: GET request to Dhiway VC endpoint failed: {{error}}
QR_URL_NOT_FOUND_IN_JSON: URL field not found in JSON data
QR_NO_URL_IN_XML: No URL found in XML content
QR_NO_URL_FOUND: No URL found in QR content
QR_PDF_NOT_SUPPORTED: PDF QR code detection is not supported. Please convert your PDF to an image (PNG, JPEG) and try again.
QR_UNSUPPORTED_FILE_TYPE: Unsupported file type for QR code detection: {{mimeType}}. Only image formats (PNG, JPEG) are supported.
QR_FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED: Downloaded file exceeds maximum size of {{maxSize}} bytes
FIELD_ALREADY_EXISTS: Field with name "{{name}}" already exists in context "{{context}}"
FIELD_NAME_CONFLICT: Field name '{{name}}' already exists in context '{{context}}'
FIELD_CANNOT_ENABLE_ENCRYPTION: Cannot enable encryption for field '{{name}}' because it has {{count}} existing values.
FIELD_CANNOT_DISABLE_ENCRYPTION: Cannot disable encryption for field '{{name}}' because it has {{count}} existing values.
FIELD_NOT_ENCRYPTED: Cannot disable encryption for field '{{name}}'. Field is not currently encrypted.
FIELD_MAPPED_TO_DOCUMENT: Field "{{name}}" (ID: {{fieldId}}) is mapped to document fields. Please remove the mapping from settings before deleting this field.
FIELD_ACCESS_FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to access this field
CONTENT_BENEFIT_NOT_FOUND: No benefit found with the provided ID
CONTENT_NO_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA: No eligibility criteria found for the benefit
APP_BENEFIT_ID_NOT_FOUND: Benefit ID not found in the request
APP_BPP_ID_NOT_FOUND: BPP ID not found in the request
APP_BPP_INFO_NOT_FOUND: BPP information not found for item {{benefitId}}
ENCRYPTION_KEY_INVALID_FORMAT: ENCRYPTION_KEY must be a base64-encoded 32-byte key
ENCRYPTION_SERIALIZE_FAILED: Failed to serialize value for encryption: {{error}}
ENCRYPTION_INVALID_DATA: Invalid encrypted data: Buffer is too short
ENCRYPTION_PARSE_FAILED: Failed to parse decrypted data as JSON: {{error}}
ENCRYPTION_RETURNED_NULL: Decryption returned null: Possible data corruption or misconfiguration
GUARD_INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: You do not have the required permissions
FIELDS_NOT_PRESENT: These fields are not present in the document: {{fields}}.
FIELDS_NOT_MATCHING: {{failedFields}} not match the user profile. Please re-upload the document.
MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD_VC: Missing required field '{{fieldName}}' in VC data
MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELD_PROFILE: Missing required field '{{fieldName}}' in user profile
MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS_IN_DOCUMENT: Missing required field(s): {{fields}}. Document Type: {{docType}}/{{docSubType}}. Please ensure these fields are clearly visible and readable in the document.
VC_SPACE_ID_REQUIRED: Space ID is required for VC creation. Please configure spaceId in vcConfiguration.
VC_DOCUMENT_TYPE_REQUIRED: Document type is required and cannot be empty.
VC_DOCUMENT_SUBTYPE_REQUIRED: Document subtype is required and cannot be empty.
VC_MISSING_VC_FIELDS_CONFIG: Cannot validate required fields: missing vcFields configuration or mapping data.
